Message.Msg: PUT THIS SPAMMER IN THE CRAPPER YAHOO !
Another fear mongering looser. That's all you guys got, lies and distortions. Get ready for 4 more years, yokle.

"The GOP is scaring people about their future. The terrorist will get us, Social Security, and Medicare will be broke in a few years. Obama's people say the other are lieing..." Well Minnifer, surely you don't believe there is no longer a terrorist threat. And, as to Social Security and Medicare, pick up any paper and you will find plenty of reports about when each will go broke and that the fixes will be painful. It seems both parties only disagree on when and how to fix them. It also seems to me the Dems are stalling and the Republicans have a sense of urgency. For me, it is a matter of which is being honest and candid about the mess. Both programs are on unsustainable paths and many experts argue the longer we wait the more difficult, both politically and personally, it will be to repair these programs. Please note, I didn't pin blame for the current state of affairs on any one party. Both are to blame. It boils down to which has the guts to seriously tackle the mess. On that, I don't have a bit of doubt. We need leadership now, not finger pointing, denial and excuses. The same is true with respect to piling on the debt and the deficit. Unfortunately Minnifer, politicians have handed us a lot to be scared about. Who best to step up and fix it? That is what we will be voting on come Nov.

What is his fear about taxes. As Gov. he refused. During the Vietnam War he said he supported it. He did so at a distance in Paris recruiting people to Mormanism. He even got his tour in Paris extended, until the lottery draft took effect. With a high number he came home from Paris. His number was 300 something. As President his number will be even higher, yet like then he can watch them die for their Country. What is in his taxes that people will pLick on poor Willard Mitt Romney. He is named after Willar Marriot of the Hotel Fame. Check they were involved in a tax fraud I heard. http://www.marriott.com/culture-and-values/jw-marriott-jr.mi

Topic.Title: Ask the twit about his 2002 taxes

Message.Msg: Then why doesn't bother you that someone that made much more than 20 million dollars in one year just had to pay about 13% in Federal taxes for that year? Did he even have to pay any Social Security tax on his income? The point is that many people who are middle class have to pay more than 13% of their income in taxes and then add in the Social Security tax that they pay on their entire income. I know that Romney's tax rate was low because it was on long term capital gains etc., but it should go back up to the rate it was during the Clinton administration for people like Romney who make millions of dollars every year.

Topic.Title: Ask the twit about his 2002 taxes

Message.Msg: "but it should go back up to the rate it was during the Clinton administration for people like Romney who make millions of dollars every year." For the first two years of his term, Obama had a Democratic majority in Congress. The Democrats have had control of Congress for the better part of this century. You state the tax rates should go back up. They haven't. Why should Romney or anyone else pay more than the law requires? Congress wrote and passed the current tax laws; mostly Democrats in Congress wrote and passed the current tax laws or refused to change them. Why do you blame Romney? What percentage did Kerry pay, or Kennedy, or Dirty Harry, or Nancy? What percentage did Little Timmy pay when working on Wall Street or should the question be didn't pay? You want to castigate someone for doing as the law requires, why? Why? Are you just upset because he was smart enough to make $200M dollars? He made it, Kennedy inherited it, Kerry married it – twice, but you don’t question the fact that they were/are filthy rich. Did Romney move a yacht to another state to avoid paying his home state taxes? Kerry did and he is still in Congress. People died in the back seat of Kennedy’s car and he stayed in Congress, Timmy didn’t pay taxes he knew he had been paid extra to cover and he got appointed to the top financial job in the administration. Why no questions about where their money came from and how much they paid?

Topic.Title: Ask the twit about his 2002 taxes

Message.Msg: winholder, all I was stating was that someone who makes that much money in one year, on a regular basis should be paying more money in taxes. I don't care if the person is a Republican or a Democrat. I also don't blame him for paying that amount if that is the law. However the Republicans do not want to raise the tax rate for the rich. In fact Romney wants to cut taxes for the rich even more.It seems they also want to prohibit ordinary folks from deducting the interest rates they have to pay on their mortgages. That could cause some of the middle class to have to pay more in taxes. It could also hurt the economy because the would have less money to spend and the economy depends on the spending done by those ordinary folks. Oh the only other thing I would be curious about concerning Romney's taxes would be- did he set up accounts outside of the U.S. to avoid paying U.S. taxes?

Topic.Title: Ask the twit about his 2002 taxes

Message.Msg: It would seem to be a lot to an ordinary person, but it is nothing to someone who makes over 20 million dollars a year.He could pay some more and not change his lifestyle one bit. For an ordinary person who is struggling paycheck to paycheck the same percentage (plus other taxes) would be very, very different.
